item.title: Fire Danger Ratings for 16 October 2023
item.description:
Content:

The following alert has been issued by the Department of Fire and Emergency Services (DFES).

Time of issue: 04:41 AM
Date of issue: 16 October 2023

Extreme Fire Danger Ratings have been forecast for the following Fire Weather Districts for 16 October 2023:

  • Midwest Coast

High Fire Danger Ratings have been forecast for the following Fire Weather Districts for 16 October 2023:

  • Kimberley Inland
  • Central Pilbara
  • Hedland
  • Burrup
  • Ashburton Inland
  • Ashburton Coast
  • Exmouth Gulf Coast
  • North Interior
  • Gascoyne Coast
  • Gascoyne Inland
  • Yalgar
  • West Interior
  • Central Interior
  • Midwest Inland
  • Lesueur
  • Yarra Yarra
  • Swan Inland North
  • Swan Inland South
  • Brockman
  • Blackwood
  • Southern Forests
  • Mortlock
  • Karroun
  • Avon
  • Lockwood
  • Roe


You can find the four-day Fire Danger Rating forecast, which Local Government Authorities are affected and relevant community safety messages on Emergency WA

END
Media Contact: DFES Media and Corporate Communications on 9395 9543.
